docs.title: Introduction
docs.description: Welcome to the eShop documentation! This guide will help you get started with setting up and configuring your eShop platform.

docs.title: Need Help?
docs.description: Delighted to serve and support you! Our dedicated support team is here to help with any questions or concerns.

docs.description: This document outlines the complete system flow of the eShop platform, covering both web admin panel and mobile application workflows.
